original_text: And Isaac breathed his last, and he died and was gathered to his people, old and full of days. And his sons Esau and Jacob buried him.
korean_text: 이삭이 나이가 많고 늙어 기운이 다하매 죽어 자기 열조에게로 돌아가니 그의 아들 에서와 야곱이 그를 장사하였더라

sentences.original_text: and was gathered to his people
And his sons Esau and Jacob buried him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 에서와 야곱이 그를 장사하였더라
